segments.text: Could you do me a favor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you possibly give me a lift home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure ? I don't want to inconvenience you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . I'd be happy to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I really appreciate it . Thanks so much .
segments.speaker: S1
